name: The Blood Bachelor
description:
Hi, welcome to my first game jam project! This game involves helping Benjamin the Vampire overcome his families curse. The theme for this project was Roots and it was a part of #WeeklyJam166. Enjoy the game! Any feedback is appreciated :)

F.Y.I you can skip over his speaking by clicking!

The time is supposed to be 1 minute but I accidentally exported it at 20 seconds. If anyone knows how to change it from here please comment.
